sentence.Network_en: His presentation was clear and incisive.
Lee was at the hub of some incisive attacks in the second half.
sentence.Network_cn: 在下半场，李组织了几次快速进攻。

sentence.Network_en: Any trawl through the band's interviews will reveal statements that are challenging and incisive.
sentence.Network_cn: 随便选取一段对该乐队的访谈都能发现令人深思、犀利精辟的言论.

1. inclination of the earth's axisincised meander 深切曲流independent variable 自变量；自变数

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'cutting, penetrating'): from medieval Latin incisivus, from Latin incidere 'cut into' (see incise)

entry.def: You use incisive to describe a person, their thoughts, or their speech when you approve of their ability to think and express their ideas clearly, briefly, and forcefully.

example.ex: ...a shrewd operator with an incisive mind...
example.tran: 头脑机敏、精明能干的经营者

means.word_mean: 1. having or demonstrating ability to recognize or draw fine distinctions;

sentences.sentence: "an acute observer of politics and politicians"
"as sharp and incisive as the stroke of a fang"

means.word_mean: 2. very penetrating and clear and sharp in operation;

auth_sentence.content: He punctured the...rhetoric of the conference with simple incisive queries.
auth_sentence.res_content: He punctured the...rhetoric of the conference with simple incisive queries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He punctured the...rhetoric of the conference with simple incisive queries.

auth_sentence.content: It was incisive, and maybe more revealing than he knew.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was incisive, and maybe more revealing than he knew.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was incisive, and maybe more revealing than he knew.

auth_sentence.content: A faint but incisive scent was apparent.
auth_sentence.res_content: A faint but incisive scent was apparent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A faint but incisive scent was apparent.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+cise切开,杀→把[没用的东西]全部切掉
de加强+cise切开,杀+ive……的→adj.决定性的
incise[v.切,切割]+ive……的→切人的→一针见血的
pre预先+cise切开,杀→预先切好→精确的
excise[v.割去,删去]+ion动作或状态→n.删除,灭绝;切除
incise[v.切,切割]+or物→切[咬]东西的东西→incisor门牙
precise[adj.精确的,清楚的]+ion表名词→n.精密,正确
circum环绕+cise切开,杀→切一圈
ex出+cise切开,杀→v.割去,删去
in进入+cise切开,杀→切进去

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: in向内,成为,进入,使……+born出生的→adj.天生的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cent唱歌+ive……的→把精神唱进去→激励
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cis=cise切+ive……的→切入→入木三分
in向内,成为,进入,使……+door门→门内的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+spir呼吸+ed的→有呼吸的→有生命的
in不,无,非+visible看得见的→adj.看不见的, 无形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 效率低的, 效率差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+efficient有效的→adj.效率低的, 效率差的
in不,无,非+accurate正确的→adj.错误的, 不准确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无行动的, 不活动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+active积极的→adj.无行动的, 不活动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不充分的, 不适当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+adequate足够的→adj.不充分的, 不适当的
in不,无,非+calculable可计算的→adj.不可计算的
in不,无,非+capable有能力的→adj.无能力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不完全的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+complete完全的,圆满的→adj.不完全的, 不完善的
in不,无,非+constant稳定的→adj.多变的,无常的
in不,无,非+convenient便利的→adj.不便的, 有困难的
in不,无,非+corrigible可改正的→adj.积习难改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不明确的;不定的,模糊的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+definite明确的→adj.不明确的;不定的,模糊的
in不,无,非+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已"→冷漠的
in不,无,非+dign高贵+ant……的→[因发脾气]不高贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可避免的, 必然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+evitable可避免的→adj.不可避免的, 必然的
in不,无,非+human人道的→adj.不人道的
in不,无,非+imit模仿+able可以……的→不能模仿的
in不,无,非+justice公正→adj.不公正
in不,无,非+noc毒害+ous……的→无害的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无意义的,低微的,微不足道的

in不,无,非+glor光荣+ious……的→不光荣的
in不,无,非+temperate自制的→adj.放纵的
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
indoor[adj.户内的]+s→adv.在户内
in向内,成为,进入,使……+curs跑+ion表名词→跑入→侵犯
in不,无,非+accuracy准确→n.错误
in不,无,非+difference不同→不不同→没什么不同,没什么了不起→冷漠,无足轻重
indifference[n. 不关心,冷漠,无足轻重]→n.漠不关心, 不在乎
in不,无,非+stability稳定→n.不稳定[性]
in不,无,非+significance意义→n.无意义
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
in向内,成为,进入,使……+put放→n.&v.输入
in向内,成为,进入,使……+augur=augury预兆,开始+ate表动词→进入开始→就职;参考:augury预兆
in向内,成为,进入,使……+corpor团体+ate表动词→v.合并
in向内,成为,进入,使……+flame火焰→v.使燃烧;激怒

in向内,成为,进入,使……+vigor活力+ate表动词→v.鼓舞,激励

means.word_mean: 直接的, 尖锐的, 深刻的, 单刀直入的

sentences.en: an incisive way of dealing with things
His presentation was clear and incisive.
